snippet.title: DanganRonpa: IT'S SHOWTIME! - Prologue
snippet.description:
Here's the prologue for a fangan I'm working on, just in case some people can't download it from itchio for whatever reason. And I may do this for the upcoming chapters as well...

If you want to play it for yourself, you can do so here: https://aquariusbat.itch.io/danganronpa-its-showtime

Also I apologize for the weird audio glitch when Connor is talking, don't know why that happened....

DISCLAIMER - Of course I don't own the music nor the sounds. They're from DanganRonpa (mostly Trigger Happy Havoc). Please support the official release (can be found on either Steam or on Playstation 4/Vita).

DO NOT ASK ME FOR FREE ART IN MY VIDEOS, IT'S RUDE.

If you ask for FREE art, I will delete your comment. If you want me to draw you something, PLEASE consider a Commission or supporting me on Patreon.

COMISSIONS: 
http://aquariusbatt.deviantart.com/art/Updated-OPEN-Commission-Sheet-577906957

TWITCH:
https://www.twitch.tv/aquariusbat

DeviantART:
http://aquariusbatt.deviantart.com/
